text: La k steqsayen ma ad yili umennu$ deg waggur iôqan. Ini: "amennu$ degs, d abekkav. Abekkav it i$elben, ar Öebbi, d assefôe$ $ef ubrid n Öebbi, d ankaô is, u d ankaô n Loamaâ n Lêaôam; d assuffe$, segs, imezda$ is". Ahewwel i$leb amennu$. Zgan a kwen pna$en, alamma swexxôen kwen, ma zemren, si ddin nnwen. Win, segwen, iff$en i ddin is, ad immet d ajehli. Widak, mêan igiten nnsen di ddunit, di laxeôt. Widak, d at tmes, degs, nitni, ad wekkôen
